title: [Health] A systematic review and meta-analysis finds the proportion of individuals experiencing fatigue 12 or more weeks following COVID-19 diagnosis was 0.32 (95% CI, 0.27, 0.37; p < 0.001; n = 25,268; I2=99.1%). For cognitive impairment, it was 0.22 (95% CI, 0.17, 0.28; p < 0.001; n = 13,232; I2=98.0).
